Flags.description: Blocks lights and shadows and does not render the model. [Credits to DPS]
Tree Props use this commonly, may be something to do with props that do not break on collision. [Credits to Carl Johnson]
Dynamic [Credits to Anatoly and Carl Johnson] | looks like its used for archetypes that have skeleton (mostly used for doors also in ydrs,yfts with skeleton)
enables (?) special atribute for door archetypes
Disable red vertex channel for object. [Credits to DPS]
Makes archetypes with white vertexes dont glow at night. | Disable green vertex channel for object. (?) [Credits to DPS] | Props commonly use this. [Credits to Carl Johnson]
Disable blue vertex channel for object. [Credits to DPS]
Disable Alpha vertex channel for object. [Credits to DPS]
